assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Subex Limited provides operations and business support systems to communication service providers (CSPs) worldwide. The company offers ROC Revenue Assurance, a solution that helps CSPs enhance CX minimize risk, manage margins, and get business insights true business assurance; and ROC Fraud Management solution to protect operator's voice and SMS services, data services, and new-age digital services from consumer, partner, and internal fraud. It also provides ROC Network Asset Management solution that offers a framework to audit network assets, evaluate inventory, and makes a business case for network upgradation, as well as a view of network assets and inventory to optimize opex and capex; and ROC Capacity Management, a solution, which gleans insights from network capacity trends, identifies capacity hot-spots, and predicts time-to-exhaustion. In addition, the company offers ROC Partner Management, a solution that facilitates in swift partner onboarding, partner self-care, revenue visibility, and communication between Telco and its partners; ROC Route Optimization solution, which processes from dial code/destination operator rate imports to switch updates; and Partner Settlement, a solution that facilitates billing and settlement to manage revenue and margins across interconnect and digital ecosystem. Further, it provides Internet of Things security, a solution from real-time discovery and monitoring to response and recovery; Analytics Center of Trust that offers end-to-end analytics framework; CrunchMetrics, a real-time analytics platform that analyzes streaming data to identify critical incidents and business opportunities; IDcentral, an identity repository enabling enterprises to convert attributes to digital identities; and managed, and consulting and assessment services. The company was formerly known as Subex Azure Limited and changed its name to Subex Limited in December 2007. Subex Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bengaluru, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Suraj  Balachandran
companyOfficers.title: Head of Sales for EMEA & APAC
